title: PBE signups error?
body: For some reason, although I am eligible for a PBE account it keeps saying "Something went wrong.Please refresh the page and try again later"? Will this problem be fixed before the end of this season?

replies.body: Just keep refreshing that page, maybe also try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) as well. The signup page has been pretty flooded from all the players trying to sign up, but it should work for everyone once the traffic has calmed down a bit.
